title: Can't connect to a game
body: I cant connect to a game after champ select, the game never load and a remake happens and due to this i'm in a low priority queue. Umm Help?

replies.body: The game not loading after champion select usually indicates a network problem, where your connection goes into a dormant state and fails to establish comms with the game server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this for good and get you back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
